For those with soil moisture level being high (B=1), the probability of crop yield being high (C=1) is 0.9799.

For those with soil moisture level being low (B=0) and crop yield being high (C=1), the probability of profit of the farmer being high (D=1) is 0.9231. 
For those with soil moisture level being high (B=1) and crop yield being low (C=0), the probability of profit of the farmer being high (D=1) is 0.7558.
